name: Kleptomanicats
description:
Use the arrow keys to move, but make sure not to stop! If you do, you get stunned!

Take the diamonds, coins, and rings to fill up the Klepto-meter, if it drops to 0, it's game over. Don't even THINK about changing the bar. It's controlled by a separate variable.

The hats are purely cosmetic. Walk over them to put them on!

Made in Scratch for the Mini Game Jam, with the theme of Cats and the limitation of 8x8 art.
